img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/ae/Wukong_UpperHollow_23.jpg)
To make things a bit easier and safer (as long as you don't mind taking your time), we recommend simply charging up your Thrust Stance and expending 2 focus points to deal with any swinging threats immediately, and then beating around the empty cocoons like pinatas to better see the path ahead (and gain Will).
img_below_text:
As you clear a path through the room, keep an eye on the wall to the right, and you should find a group of hanging cocoons blocking a small alcove. Inside, you'll find a **Treasure Chest** with random materials, but also a Beetle Captain that will burst out of a nearby cocoon!
![Wukong UpperHollow 25.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0f/Wukong_UpperHollow_25.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 25 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong UpperHollow 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/ae/Wukong_UpperHollow_23.jpg)
To make things a bit easier and safer (as long as you don't mind taking your time), we recommend simply charging up your Thrust Stance and expending 2 focus points to deal with any swinging threats immediately, and then beating around the empty cocoons like pinatas to better see the path ahead (and gain Will)."
            - Following Text: "As you clear a path through the room, keep an eye on the wall to the right, and you should find a group of hanging cocoons blocking a small alcove. Inside, you'll find a **Treasure Chest** with random materials, but also a Beetle Captain that will burst out of a nearby cocoon!
![Wukong UpperHollow 25.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0f/Wukong_UpperHollow_25.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, cavernous room filled with webbing and large cocoons. A character, armed with a torch, is seen approaching a treasure chest highlighted by a red circle. The preceding text advises players to clear threats and break empty cocoons to navigate safely, while the following text mentions finding a treasure chest and encountering a Beetle Captain. The image serves to illustrate the location of the treasure chest within the game "Black Myth: Wukong" and the potential dangers lurking nearby.
